@rachramblingon you're such a beautiful person inside and out!
@rachramblingon you're strong and over the last year I've seen your strength so remember how far you've come! Sending love 💕
@rachramblingon shall hopefully feel calmer soon, you have my number if ever you want to meet up for a coffee
@rachramblingon I'm a big promoter of a problem shared is a problem halved so keep talking and expressing how you feel and things
@rachramblingon isn't affected by the situation is a good way to release without feeling like you're burdening others
@rachramblingon and to feel stronger again before you tackle the "everyday" again, I find talking something through with someone that
@rachramblingon I know it is so easy for me to say, but make sure you're taking time for yourself, give your body time to rest
